caption.p: Species‐level abundance of F. ovina and P. lanceolata within simulated climate change treatments at BCCIL (data from Fridley et al., 2011). Abundance was measured as ordinal vegetation cover class (0 = 0–4%; 1 = 5–24%; 2 = 25–49%; 3 = 50–74%; 4 = 75% +) within 10 × 10 cm permanent quadrats located within each 3 × 3 m grassland plot (eight quadrats per plot, five plots per treatment). Error bars show one standard error of the mean.
